mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_POSTS ( company_id, job_post_title, job_post_optional_image, job_post_contact_number, job_post_required_educations, job_post_job_category, job_post_job_type, job_post_working_period, job_work_schedule, job_post_shift_hours, job_post_salary, job_post_work_place, job_post_status, job_post_due_date, job_post_created_at, job_post_updated_at ) VALUES ( #{companyId}, #{jobPostTitle}, #{jobPostOptionalImage}, #{jobPostContactNumber}, #{jobPostRequiredEducations}, #{jobPostJobCategory}, #{jobPostJobType}, #{jobPostWorkingPeriod}, #{jobWorkSchedule}, #{jobPostShiftHours}, #{jobPostSalary}, #{jobPostWorkPlace}, #{jobPostStatus}, #{jobPostDueDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT j.*, c.company_name AS companyName, c.company_logo AS companyLogo FROM JOB_POSTS j LEFT JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.company_id WHERE j.job_post_id = #{jobPostId}

SELECT j.*, c.company_name AS companyName, c.company_logo AS companyLogo FROM JOB_POSTS j LEFT JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.company_id WHERE j.company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY j.job_post_created_at DESC

SELECT j.*, c.company_name AS companyName, c.company_logo AS companyLogo FROM JOB_POSTS j LEFT JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.company_id
ORDER BY j.job_post_created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

if.test: jobCategory != null and jobCategory != '' and jobCategory != 'all'
jobType != null and jobType != '' and jobType != 'all'

where.if: AND ( j.job_post_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR j.job_post_work_place LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND j.job_post_status = true AND j.job_post_due_date >= CURRENT_DATE

mapper.update: UPDATE JOB_POSTS SET job_post_title = #{jobPostTitle}, job_post_optional_image = #{jobPostOptionalImage}, job_post_contact_number = #{jobPostContactNumber}, job_post_required_educations = #{jobPostRequiredEducations}, job_post_job_category = #{jobPostJobCategory}, job_post_job_type = #{jobPostJobType}, job_post_working_period = #{jobPostWorkingPeriod}, job_work_schedule = #{jobWorkSchedule}, job_post_shift_hours = #{jobPostShiftHours}, job_post_salary = #{jobPostSalary}, job_post_work_place = #{jobPostWorkPlace}, job_post_due_date = #{jobPostDueDate}, job_post_updated_at = NOW() WHERE job_post_id = #{jobPostId}
UPDATE JOB_POSTS SET job_post_status = #{status}, job_post_updated_at = NOW() WHERE job_post_id = #{jobPostId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOB_POSTS j LEFT JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.company_id
SELECT * FROM JOB_POSTS WHERE job_post_due_date >= NOW() ORDER BY job_post_due_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM JOB_POSTS WHERE job_post_due_date >= NOW() ORDER BY job_post_due_date DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT * FROM JOB_POSTS WHERE job_post_work_place = #{resumeLocation} OR job_post_working_period = #{resumeJobDuration} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 6
SELECT * FROM JOB_POSTS WHERE job_post_due_date >= NOW() ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 6

SELECT * FROM JOB_POSTS JOIN COMPANIES on JOB_POSTS.company_id = COMPANIES.company_id
AND JOB_POSTS.job_post_work_place LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionSelect}, '%')
AND JOB_POSTS.job_post_job_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{jobCategorySelect}, '%')
AND ( JOB_POSTS.job_post_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR JOB_POSTS.job_post_contact_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR COMPANIES.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
